poemsDataJson.list_full: 君(きみ)がため 春(はる)の野(の)に出(い)でて 若菜(わかな)つむ わが衣手(ころもで)に 雪(ゆき)は降(ふ)りつつ
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: It is for your sake//That I walk the fields in spring,//Gathering green herbs,//While my garment's hanging sleeves//Are speckled with falling snow.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Kimi ga tame|Haru no no ni idete|Wakana tsumu|Waga koromo-de ni|Yuki wa furi tsutsu
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: わかころもてに ゆきはふりつつ
poemsDataJson.author: 光孝天皇(こうこうてんのう)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 雪に降られながら若菜を摘む、相手へのまごころ
